Figure 1:Overview of our Unified Diffusion VLA.We first construct a unified multimodal space by quantizing multimodal information into discrete tokens.
We then formalize a Joint Discrete Denoising Diffusion Process (JD3P) to allow visual generation and action prediction to be intrinsically synergistic.
Moreover, we build our model on a pre-trained VLM and conduct two-stage training.
Finally, we balance performance and efficiency during inference through several key techniques.
Figure 4:Visualization of Generated Future Frames and Ground-truth Frames.The leftmost frame of each trajectory represents the current observation.
Figure 5:Qualitative Comparison of discrete diffusion and continuous diffusion.
